name: Virus Mutant
description:
In the future some viruses mutate to become as big as human, humanity is threatened. So you as a player have to protect humanity by killing all viruses

Kill all viruses and protect humanity from the dangerous mutated virus

The control is simple

You just have to swipe your finger on your touchscreen to aim the gun, and if you have a trouble to aim acurate you can tap on aim button to improve yout accuracy

this game was made by me Roki as a Coder, and Artist

Background Music form: soundimage.org

Sound Effect form: zapsplat.com
